definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The steam locomotives were superseded by diesel units.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽機車已被柴油內燃機車所取代。

sentences.english: It also sums up the developing conditions of diesel locomotives in China and puts up some suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 概述了我國內燃機車發展現狀，並提出了建議。

sentences.english: It is the professional manufacturer of diesel locomotive of railroad drawing motivation.
sentences.chinese: 是鐵路牽引動力內燃機車的專業生產廠。

sentences.english: Develops a CAD system for gear pump design of locomotives.
sentences.chinese: 研製了一個內燃機車用齒輪泵的CAD系統。

sentences.english: Refuelling facilities will be needed for diesel locomotives and DMUs.
sentences.chinese: 還要有爲內燃機車和內燃動車組加油的設施。
